attributes.action: re-issue the queens silver jubilee medal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
in 1977 thousands of armed forces and emergency service personnel were robbed of this medal and the right to wear it.
due to issues of cost by the government.
i ask prime minister gordon brown to rectify this dispicable act and issue the medal to all those that are rightly entitled to it.
